channel.title: CVE Feed for Perl Toolchain Gang -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Perl Toolchain Gang -- all products

item.title: CVE-2013-1437|2024-08-06T15:04:48.318Z -- perl%20toolchain%20gang -- module-metadata
item.description: Eval injection vulnerability in the Module-Metadata module before 1.000015 for Perl allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary Perl code via the $Version value.
